lines.text: We'll talk later. I got a thing.
This guy Rooney's as sharp as a marble.
You're making a big mistake, Danny.
Yeah, well, you make enough of them, you get good at it.
I, I put six bullets in him. You're telling me I didn't kill him?
It wasn't meant as a criticism.
I get lots of guns, okay? People give them to me on the street. They give them to me for birthday presents. It's like I'm the NRA or something.
I have to live with the choices I made, Quinn. You want to come after me, you're gonna have to stand in line.
